Pre-Game Insights: Belgium will be heading into Monday's Euro 2024 fixture against Slovakia having put together a 17-match streak.
The Red Devils are the clear favourites to prevail from a group that also features Romania and Ukraine.
Domenico Tedesco will be confident that his side can start positively at the Frankfurt Arena having not lost a single game since his appointment.
A total of 10 victories and four draws have been recorded in 14 matches since February 2023, with Belgium having not lost since defeat to Morocco at the 2022 World Cup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Belgium currently on 44-year streak without a single draw in European Championship fixtures
Belgium have played in four European Championships since losing in the final in 1980, being eliminated in the group stage in 1984 and 2000 before quarter-finals appearances in 2016 and 2020.
